duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for all areas of sales support & service for customers, including sales orders, documentation, inquiry, and troubleshooting.
Support the field sales force and proactively develop sales and distribution.
Occasional trips to the field for customer support improvements.
Maintain accounts, perform quotes, and enter data into inventory/sales system.
Set up delivery schedules and complete reconciliation at the end of orders.
Balance purchase orders and invoices, order special order items, and provide customer service to accounts.
Coordinate with dispatch, credit, purchasing, and any other departments as required.

education_certification.credential: Previous relevant customer service experience required (i.e. construction, retail, manual labor, etc.)
MS Office proficiency, including Excel, required. Knowledge of the construction Industry is a plus.
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
